Upcoming Events

Displays the two upcoming events

Events

Upcoming Events

22December

Ktherine Ryan to host Event Awards 2017

22 December 2017- 196 Manhattan, MY, USA

Comedian Katherine Ryan will present this year's Event Awards on 13 October at the iconic Eventim Apollo in Hammersmith, London.

Ktherine Ryan to host Event Awards 2017

29 September 2017- 196 Manhattan, MY, USA

Comedian Katherine Ryan will present this year's Event Awards on 13 October at the iconic Eventim Apollo in Hammersmith, London.

Markup: upcoming-events/upcoming-events.twig 
<section class="event-area section-padding">
  <div class="event-area-bg" style="background-image: url('{{ background_image }}')"></div>
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="area-title text-center">
          <h2>{{ pre_title }}</h2>
          <h3>{{ title }}</h3>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row event-list">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        {% for item in items %}
        <div class="single-event">
          <div class="event-img">
            <img src="{{ item.image.src }}" alt="{{ item.image.alt }}">
          </div>
          <div class="event-content">
            <div class="event-date">
              <p><span>{{ item.date.day }}</span>{{ item.date.month }}</p>
            </div>
            <div class="event-details">
              <h3><a href="single-event.html">{{ item.title }}</a></h3>
              <p class="event-meta"><a href="#">{{ item.date.full }}</a>- {{ item.location }}</p>
              <p>{{ item.description }}</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
